contest-event.event-date:
July 24, 1937 D Banbury Contest (Section 1)
Banbury Contest (Section 1) 10 Test Piece Contest Banbury Contest banbury-contest-section-1
None
Il Pirata [unknown arranger]
Hospital Grounds, Banbury, Oxfordshire Result as shown in Brass Band News August 1937. Letter in same publication in September 1937 states correct result to be - 1st Finedon, 2nd Leicester Imperial, 3rd Raunds. (dutchy) 6 bands competed.
Nov. 16, 2013, 2:10 p.m. Jan. 19, 2019, 11:01 a.m.
1 Raunds Temperance Band R. Pentelow
2 Kirby Imperial Simeon Iliffe
3 Finedon Old Prize Band A. G. Remington
4 Rushden Town Silver Prize Band M. J. Roberts
Unknown Result City of Oxford Silver Band R. O. G. Jenkins
Unknown Result Coventry Silver William Ellison
